DOC.brief_title: Iodine Nutrition During Pregnancy Related Neonatal Physical Development
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Recent study find , develop develop country , still considerable number pregnant woman iodine deficiency status . Our overall aim monitor iodine status pregnant woman China , examine correlation maternal urine iodine concentration ( UIC ) newborn physical development level . Design : prospective cohort study Methods : During August - December 2015,250 participant ( 28-32 week ' gestation ) select participate study.The investigator collect spot urine sample ( n=750 ) every two week . Setting : Xinhua Hospital Affiliated Shanghai Jiaotong University School Medicine . Participants : 150 normal pregnant woman 100 pregnant woman gestational diabetes ( 28-32 week ' gestation ) newborns select participate study .
DOC.criteria: 2235 year , 2832 week ' gestation , know history thyroid disease nonpregnant state previous .
